title: Cog1
description: Cog1 is an agency that's been up since 2001, and needed a rebrand to keep pace with the ever changing digital industry. With a team effort of the design and development team we were able to build a fresh new website.

title: IREI
description: With a group of three Web developers and a design team we help IREI construct a great user experience and easily manageable WordPress CMS.

title: Reactor Core
description: Reactor Core is a network of educational institutions specialized in coding, programming and development technologies. Working at COG1, we crafted the created another easy manageable WordPress CMS.

title: WPengine
description: As part of the COG1 development team we constructed WPengine to have great user experience and easily manageable WordPress CMS.
